data.text:
It was great experience with the hotel and they were really corporative and rooms were clean 
On top of that they were trying to ful fill all your requests on time.
Myat , Rain & Aleena , Kin gem and Captain (Hanif) , We will definitely comeback again
data.title: Superb Stay

data.text: Excellent customer service, excellent location, very friendly and helpful staff.  Breakfast was delicious.   Overall outstanding hotel in Dubai. We'll definitely come back thanks Mr.Hanif and team and thanks to staff reception staff good
data.title: Best Hotel

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,

We are grateful for your positive and encouraging feedback. Your opinion is precious to us, and we continuously use feedback like yours to improve the guest experience. Your comments were highly appreciated and have been shared with our team members. We look forward to serving you again soon!

Sincerely,
The Grand Excelsior Hotel Bur Dubai Team
owner_response.author: Grand Excelsior Hotel Bur Dubai

data.text:
Staff are good and Accommodating and also easy to approach. Food is pretty excellent. Nice location and have an easy access to other place. Close to the train station. Close to stores and other spots . Room is clean. 

I have only one problem to my room where I stay. The phone is not working properly.
data.title: Grand Excelsior Hotel Bur Dubai review

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,

We appreciate your positive and encouraging feedback. Your opinion is precious to us, and we use feedback like yours to improve the guest experience continuously. Your comments were highly appreciated and shared with our team members. We apologise for any inconvenience we may have caused you and look forward to serving you again soon.

We understand that our products and services play a crucial role in making our guests' stay memorable. Although it is unpleasant to hear that we did not meet your expectations, we need to receive your feedback to highlight areas requiring immediate improvement. Rest assured, your comments have been noted and addressed with the concerned departments to ensure that this is an isolated incident and to avoid any future occurrences.

We thank you for bringing this to our attention, and we assure you that anything brought to our notice is treated with care and attention.

Sincerely,
The Grand Excelsior Hotel Bur Dubai Team
owner_response.author: Grand Excelsior Hotel Bur Dubai

data.text: Excellent service by mofizur. Nice hotel … thanks to all staff..nice environment.. nice neighbor hood…good food…breathtaking dubai view.. nice swimming pool…good#nice#good#bye bye dubai .. see you again in some time.. will remember life time
data.title: Good hotel.. pure Indian

owner_response.author: Grand Excelsior Hotel Bur Dubai

data.text:
Please avoid this hotel. Got check in at 4.00 pm after repeatedly hounding the reception. If check out is at 12 noon, then why are rooms not ready by 3.00 this was unacceptable and we missed 1 hr of our time at our next activity due to this. 
They don’t give water except two small bottles every day. Please be ready to buy water from supermarkets nearby . 
The breakfast area is extremely overcrowded through out and  things get over quickly and refilling takes a lot of time. 
The size of twin beds was extremely small due to which we had to change the room at 11 PM in the night.
Only plus point of the hotel was the service staff specially the house keeping who were very quick and always ready to help
Stay in this hotel only if you need to be close to Indian restaurants otherwise, totally avoidable
data.title: Not 3 star for sure.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,

Thank you for providing feedback on your recent stay at Grand Excelsior Hotel Bur Dubai. We apologise for any inconvenience caused during your stay. Our goal is to provide exceptional products and services to our guests, and we are sorry to hear that we fell short of your expectations. We appreciate your feedback as it helps us identify areas that need improvement.

Please be assured that we have noted your comments and addressed them with the relevant departments to ensure that this is an isolated incident and to prevent any future occurrences. We value your feedback and assure you that we take all comments seriously and carefully.

Thank you for choosing Grand Excelsior Hotel Bur Dubai, and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back in the future.

Sincerely,
	
The Grand Excelsior Hotel Bur Dubai Team
owner_response.author: Grand Excelsior Hotel Bur Dubai
